ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t believe I ve ever seen a bard guide. Couldn t a bard guide just give himself a pair of Selo s drums?  Dunno what guides can and can t do, but I imagine
ygData.messageBody:
I don't believe I've ever seen a bard guide.

Couldn't a bard guide just give himself a pair of Selo's drums? Dunno what
guides can and can't do, but I imagine they can give themselves whatever
equipment...??

If you had a choice, based on looks and class restrictions alone, what would
you dress in? Lambent, Singing Steel, or Imbrued? Or something else?

I'd probably stick with lambent. :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 11:02 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


way back when... at 35 with a mm drum (nearly 2 years ago) i raced one, I
think its around 35 or so that we're even speed/might be a wee bit faster

Minkin
RIP
53 bard of Ayonae Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: Vic Matos [mailto:matosvr@...]
Sent: June 1, 2001 10:44 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


I dont know if the songs dont stack cuz I dont mem AOE after getting my SS
boots, but Clicking on the boots and then running Selos definitely does
stack. So Im gonna try and find a guidre to race LOL.

Arud Bastad
46 Bard on Bristlebane
-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-24935-991235037-matosvr=theriver.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-24935-991235037-matosvr=theriver.com@....c
om]On Behalf Of Henrik Holm
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 8:01 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


Selo and arie of eagles do not stack, this was a nessesary nerf because
bards would outrun guides and make fun of them. Now the will plummet to
their death in many areas

Musiker ;)
> -----Original Message-----
> From: firehawk@... [mailto:firehawk@...]
> Sent: 30. maj 2001 16:53
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
>
>
> Something you say?? Based on the history of Verant and our
> class. I think you understated the problem. I will never
> forget the great falling of 99 when they messed with spell
> chaincasting and bard song would not refresh. Ohh how many
> bards fell to their deaths that day. If anyone manages to
> get on and test please let us know how it goes.
>
> My personal pet peeve here is they should post what songs no
> longer stack it's not like there is anyway we can know what
> the did not intend for us to do, and I would prefer not to
> die because I suddenly can't twist verses of celerity and
> chant of battle. Okay I wouldn't die but you folk know what I mean.
>
> On Wed, 30 May 2001 15:42:36 +0200 eqbards@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> > Cause it means that they have F***ed something up
> >
> > Musiker, bertox
> > p.s. I like that they increased the duration on charm song tho :)
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
> > > Sent: 30. maj 2001 15:36
> > > To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> > > Subject: [eqbards] Patch Message
> > >
> > >
> > > Why does this make my blood run cold?
> > > ** Spell and Song Changes and Bug Fixes **
> > >
> > > - We've been fixing holes in the spell stacking code. For the
> > > most part the
> > > changes fix bugs that allowed tricks to get spells to stack
> > > that were never
> > > intended to stack.
> > >
> > > On the other hand, this is nice although I don't charm as
> > > much as I used to.
> > >
> > > - Increased duration on Bard Charm songs to 18 seconds from
> > > 12 seconds.
> > >
> > > Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> > > Venator Sapentia, Xegony
> > >
> > >
